summary: This is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) personnel and a contractor regarding the process of pulling emails for a second production related to the Epstein investigation. The discussion centers on whether to pull all emails in a folder or just those in a specific 'Emails Epstein Investigation' folder.

events.title: Email discussion about Epstein investigation document production
events.description: USANYS personnel and a contractor correspond about pulling emails for a second production related to the Epstein investigation, deciding to take a conservative approach by pulling all emails in a folder.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) was actively managing document production for the Epstein investigation as of April 2021.
A second wave of document production was being prepared, indicating ongoing investigative or discovery work.
The correspondence shows procedural decision-making about whether to pull all emails in a folder or be more selective, with a 'conservative approach' chosen.
All personal names in the email chain are redacted, showing the document has been processed to protect identities.
